xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/250929-Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bgv2S0Tjp0AbKUW6PWE2pRfjZ7Q.jpg A sensitive and realistic portrayal of the families' grief after the devastating crash of Swissair flight 111, in which all 229 passengers and crew were killed. A woman whose daughter was among the victims meets a fisherman in Nova Scotia who took part in the recovery mission. Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
